    • changePassword

      @PutMapping("/change-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> changePassword(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid ChangePasswordRequestDTO changePasswordRequest, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Change password request.

      Note: This method is protected by JWT token.

      Parameters:
      changePasswordRequest - request with old and new password
      token - JWT token
      Returns:
      status indicating if password was changed

    • updateProfile

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UpdateProfileResponse> updateProfile(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserProfileUpdateRequestDTO userProfile, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Update user profile.

      Note: This method is protected by JWT token.

      Parameters:
      userProfile - user profile to update
      token - JWT token
      Returns:
      status indicating if profile was updated

    • getUserProfileById

      @GetMapping("/profile/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserProfileById(@PathVariable UUID userId, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Get user profile by id.

      Note: This method is protected by JWT token.

      Parameters:
      userId - user id
      token - JWT token
      Returns:
      user profile, id and role

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUserById(@PathVariable UUID userId, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Delete user by id.

      Note: This method is protected by JWT token.

      Parameters:
      userId - user id
      token - JWT token
      Returns:
      status indicating if user was deleted

      Note: This method is jwt (protected by jwt token).
